Study: Clinical course and risk factors for mortality of adult inpatients with COVID-19 in Wuhan, China: a retrospective cohort study (The Lancet)
Source / Summary: Median shedding with lopinavir/ritonavir = 22 days, median in severe cases = 22 days, median in critical cases = 24 days

Study: Virus shedding patterns in nasopharyngeal and fecal specimens of COVID-19 patients (medRxiv)
Source / Summary: Viral titers of nasal-throat swabs peaked at 6-9 DAO

Study: Viral Kinetics and Antibody Responses in Patients with COVID-19 (medRxiv)
Source / Summary: Nasophayngeal is a major shedding area.

Study: Viral dynamics in mild and severe cases of COVID-19 (The Lancet Infectious Disease)
Source / Summary: Mild illness cleared by ~10 DAO, severe cases last longer.

Study: Evaluation of SARS-CoV-2 RNA shedding in clinical specimens and clinical characteristics of 10 patients with COVID-19 in Macau (International Journal of Biological Sciences)
Source / Summary: Average RNA conversion time for NPS is 18.2 days (SD: 4.6)

Study: Epidemiologic Features and Clinical Course of Patients Infected With SARS-CoV-2 in Singapore (JAMA)
Source / Summary: 83% of patients had nasopharynx viral shedding >7 days
